name: pk
description: Stripe's publishable key, you can retrieve this from your Stripe dashboard.

name: elementsOptions
description: A set of options to create this Elements instance with.

name: tokenData
description: An object containing additional payment information you might have collected.  Although these fields are optional, we highly recommend collecting name and address.

name: disableAdvancedFraudDetection
description: Disables the advanced fraud detection feature.

name: classes
description: Set custom class names on the container DOM element when the Stripe element is in a particular state.

name: elementStyle
description: Customize the appearance of this element using CSS properties passed in a Style object.

name: value
description: A pre-filled set of values to include in the input (e.g., {postalCode: '94110'}). Note that sensitive card information (card number, CVC, and expiration date) cannot be pre-filled.

name: hidePostalCode
description: Hide the postal code field. Default is false. If you are already collecting a full billing address or postal code elsewhere, set this to true.

name: iconStyle
description: Appearance of the icon in the Element. Either solid or default.

name: hideIcon
description: Hides the icon in the Element. Default is false.

name: disabled
description: Applies a disabled state to the Element such that user input is not accepted. Default is false.
